findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function _getTotalShares() uses a loop to find and decrease shares from the _excludedFromStaking list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are too many excluded addresses.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The team/owner has excessive privileges to perform various actions such as buying back BNB, excluding and including in staking, withdrawing marketing balance, disabling auto call of _swapContractToken function, and more.
